name: Flash Furniture Mid-Back Mesh Office Chair with Mesh Fabric Seat

reviews.name: Mesh Office Chair with T-Arms, Black
reviews.reviewText: I got this chair because i'd sat in a similar one and I thought it was really comfortable but the moment I put the chair together and sat down I hear a slight crunching sound, I checked it out and didn't see anything so I paid it no mind, I now realize that the back can't be leaned on at all the screws in the bottom dug their way out.
reviews.title: No support

reviews.name: Mesh Office Chair with T-Arms, Black
reviews.reviewText: The chair is nice. However, I did not notice that it does NOT have adjustable arms when I ordered it. My fault, but keep this in mind if it is an issue.
reviews.title: 24 September 2013

reviews.name: Mesh Office Chair with T-Arms, Black
reviews.reviewText: It's a chair. The only thing I don't like 100% is that the wheels don't seem to turn well on my floor, but that could be because it's hardwood. Either way though, the floor is getting way less scratches now compared to using a pull out chair, so yay.
reviews.title: It's a chair!

reviews.name: Mesh Office Chair with T-Arms, Black
reviews.reviewText: This is a great chair. Now I'm going to have to buy another one cause my wife is jealous. It is ergonomically the best chair I've ever worked out of. Assembly in minutes, and easy to get, Walmart is the BEST, Thanks, Ray
reviews.title: great chair
